A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie wasn't perfect\, but it was far better than the handful of butthurt fanboy trolls would have you believe.   Ignore the minority that spams all the reviews\, comment sections\, and forums.  This was a solid movie filled with all kinds of fun new trick\, exciting new ideas\, and a bold new direction.  I enjoyed 95% of it\, and the 5% that gave me pause is easy to overlook.  What a fun\, exciting\, new and different take on Star Wars.
